mapper.update:
UPDATE data_league_rank_goal SET
data_league_rank_goal.LeagueId = #{ leagueId },
data_league_rank_goal.ClubId = #{ clubId },
data_league_rank_goal.ClubHistoryId = #{ clubHistoryId },
data_league_rank_goal.PlayerId = #{ playerId },
data_league_rank_goal.Goals = #{ goals },
data_league_rank_goal.PreRanking = #{ preRanking },
data_league_rank_goal.Ranking = #{ ranking },
data_league_rank_goal.Year = #{ year },
data_league_rank_goal.EndYear = #{ endYear },
data_league_rank_goal.CreatedAt = #{ createdAt },
data_league_rank_goal.UpdatedAt = #{ updatedAt }
WHERE id= #{id}
